title: The Favorites - NFL Preseason + 2022 Player Props
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Preseason + 2022 Player Props
description:
Actual NFL games return this week with the 2022 season kickoff Hall of Fame Game, a sloppy preseason spectacle only a gambler could love. The annual rite of summer is the perfect time for Action Network hosts Chad Millman and Simon Hunter to bring on Chris Raybon, an expert in NFL player projections and betting NFL preseason games. Chris is also the co-host of the Fantasy Flex podcast, where he and Action's Director of Predictive Analytics Sean Koerner have developed some of the most accurate NFL player projections in the world. Today our trio goes through what every fan needs to know before wagering on the preseason, plus the best 2022 player props to lock in now before the season starts. Is it time to fade Baker Mayfield? #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
